sentences.en: Both readers commend Knutson for his scrupulous attention to detail.
sentences.cn: 两位读者都称赞克努森对细节一丝不苟。

sentences.en: explained her proposal in detail.
sentences.cn: 详细解释她的方案

sentences.en: He was petty-minded and obsessed with detail.
sentences.cn: 他小肚鸡肠，满脑子都是鸡毛蒜皮的事儿。

sentences.en: His canoes are known for their style, fine detail and craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 他的独木舟以其风格独特、注重细节和做工精细著称。

sentences.en: I have discussed this topic in some detail.
sentences.cn: 我已经较为详细地探讨了这个话题。

sentences.en: It wasn't a spur-of-the-moment decision. We discussed it in detail beforehand.
sentences.cn: 这可不是头脑一热作出的决定。我们事先仔细地讨论过。

sentences.en: Let us look at these views in more detail.
sentences.cn: 我们来具体研究一下这些观点。

sentences.en: No detail was too small to escape her attention.
sentences.cn: 再小的细节都逃不过她的眼睛。

sentences.en: She told me every detail of her trip.
sentences.cn: 她把旅行的所有细节都告诉了我。

sentences.en: Tell me the main points now; leave the details till later.
sentences.cn: 现在把要点告诉我，细节留到以后再说。

sentences.en: The Chief Inspector disliked being overburdened with insignificant detail.
sentences.cn: 总督察讨厌在细枝末节上没完没了地纠缠。

sentences.en: The painting had been executed with meticulous attention to detail.
sentences.cn: 画这幅画的时候，画家非常注意细节。

sentences.en: The report details the progress we have made over the last year.
sentences.cn: 报告详述了去年我们取得的进展。

sentences.en: The sheer quantity of detail would bemuse even the most clear-headed author.
sentences.cn: 光是这么多的细节就会让哪怕是头脑最清醒的作者感到困惑。

sentences.en: These designs demonstrate her unerring eye for colour and detail.
sentences.cn: 这些设计体现了她对颜色和细节的精准眼光。

sentences.en: They will take that problem apart and analyze it in great detail.
sentences.cn: 他们会认真分析那个问题，指出其症结所在。

sentences.en: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.cn: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

sentences.en: Though off-puttingly complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentences.cn: 虽然地税在细节上复杂得要命，但在本质上却很简单。

sentences.en: We examine the wording in detail before deciding on the final text.
sentences.cn: 我们彻底仔细地检查了措词后才最终定稿。

sentences.en: We like his attention to detail and his enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 我们喜欢他的细心和热情。
